DataAssessmentMetric.name: DataAssessmentMetric
DataAssessmentMetric.description: Represents a summary of statistics for fields matched and unmatched in your account records with Data.com account records.

Name.description: An optional field used to name your record.

NumMatchedDifferent.description: The number of records in your org matched with a Data.com record that have different fields.

NumProcessed.description: The number of records processed in the data assessment.

NumTotal.description: The number of records available for data assessment processing.

NumUnmatched.description: The number of records not matched.
